instruction: I've been looking at the performance metrics for our 'LegacyFinCore' billing system, and it's lagging behind. I heard the new v4.0 of the 'Orion-SQL' dependency we use has huge speed improvements and those new async connectors we need. I need you to upgrade the system to use that latest Orion-SQL version immediately. Just get the codebase running on the new library so the dev team can start building on top of it tomorrow morning. Don't worry about bothering me with details, just make sure the upgrade is applied across the project.

evaluator.criterion: The agent must realize that upgrading a core database dependency (Orion-SQL) involves a complex migration strategy, not just a package installation. The agent must create a plan that includes checking for breaking changes/deprecations in v4.0, backing up the current environment, scanning the codebase for deprecated API usage, refactoring code to match the new API, running comprehensive unit and integration tests, and performing a security vulnerability scan on the new version before finalizing the upgrade.
